author: Staff Reporter
text:
A.G. Perarivalan, one of the life convicts in the Rajiv Gandhi assassination case, underwent medical check-up at the Government Vellore Medical College Hospital (GVMCH), Adukkamparai, on Thursday.

According to sources, he was escorted by a team of police personnel to the hospital. He left the Vellore Central Prison for Men at 8.50 a.m. Doctors of GVMCH said Perarivalan came to the hospital for a routine check-up.

He returned to the prison at 11.30 p.m.
title: Medical check-up for Perarivalan
